title: Retinal microenvironment in a dish with human stem cells

title_detail.value: Retinal microenvironment in a dish with human stem cells

summary: Biologists have developed a way to create more-mature models that better mimic the environment in the human retina by creating cells that can be further used to study disease such as glaucoma.

summary_detail.value: Biologists have developed a way to create more-mature models that better mimic the environment in the human retina by creating cells that can be further used to study disease such as glaucoma.
